title: 68. You are Allowed to be Your Authentic Self
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking all about being authentic with yourself. We talk about how codependency can make it difficult to be your most authentic, true version of yourself, and why you should push through the blockages, and embrace your most authentic self anyway. Tune in to hear more!

Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!

(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)

Click here to get your FREE copy of my Anatomy of Self Love workbook
(or visit beatricekamau.com/selfloveworkbook)

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
